    • getCertificateByProductAndOperation

      public Certificate getCertificateByProductAndOperation(Product product, Operation operation) throws CertificateNotFoundException
      Finds a certificate of the party
      Parameters:
      product - Particular product
      operation - Operation which party performs on the product
      Returns:
      Found certificate or null
      Throws:
      CertificateNotFoundException - Exception if no certificate was found
